Welcome.

This start wizard will guide you through the basic setup of your Dreambox.
Press the OK button on your remote control to move to the next step.
Use the up/down keys on your remote control to select an option. After that, press OK.

text.value: Do you want to enable the parental control feature on your dreambox?
You need to set a PIN code and hide it from your children.\n\nDo you want to set the pin now?
Please be aware, that anyone can disable the parental control, if you have not set a PIN.
